All Classes

Class
Description
Action
Represents an action that can be executed within the plugin.
ActionManager
Manages the registration and execution of actions within the plugin.
ChatUtilities
A utility class for sending formatted chat messages to players and command senders in a Bukkit-based server.
Command
Represents a command in the plugin.
CommandHandler
Handles command execution and tab completion for a specific registered command.
CommandManager
Manages command registration, execution, and tab completion.
ConfigHandler
Handles the creation, loading, saving, and reloading of a YAML configuration file.
ConfigManager
Manages multiple configuration files by mapping them to an Enum type.
Item
Utility class for creating and modifying ItemStack instances with custom properties such as names, lore, enchantments, attributes, and persistent data.
ScoreBoardManager
Manages the creation and updating of player scoreboards in Bukkit.
